function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and infiltration levels in residences, leading to the potential spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of viral and bacterial transmission within the built environment.","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation and filtration systems, implementing regular maintenance practices, and monitoring air quality.","Technologies":"HVAC systems with advanced filtration, air purifiers, and smart ventilation control systems.","People":"Occupants of the residences, building maintenance staff, and public health officials.","Owner":"Building owners, property management companies, and public health organizations."}]}
